documents.title: Valid Passport
documents.description: Must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your period of stay.

documents.title: Form I-20
documents.description: Original Form I-20 issued by your SEVP-certified US university, signed by you and the DSO.

documents.title: SEVIS I-901 Fee Receipt
documents.description: Proof of payment of the $350 SEVIS fee.

documents.title: DS-160 Confirmation Page
documents.description: Printout of the confirmation page. Note: You must disclose all social media handles used in the last 5 years.

documents.title: Proof of Financial Support
documents.description: Bank statements, loan sanction letter, or sponsor affidavit (Form I-134) covering 1st year expenses.

documents.title: Academic Transcripts
documents.description: Original mark sheets, degree certificates, and standardized test scores (GRE/GMAT/TOEFL/IELTS).

documents.title: Appointment Confirmation
documents.description: Letter confirming your VAC and Consular appointments.

steps_flow.title: Get Accepted & Receive I-20
steps_flow.description: Apply to US universities. Once accepted, the school will issue Form I-20.

steps_flow.title: Pay SEVIS Fee
steps_flow.description: Pay the $350 I-901 SEVIS fee online at fmjfee.com.

steps_flow.title: Complete DS-160
steps_flow.description: Fill out the online visa application form. Ensure all social media details are accurate.

steps_flow.title: Pay Visa Fee & Schedule
steps_flow.description: Pay the $185 MRV fee and book your VAC and Interview slots.

steps_flow.title: Attend Interview
steps_flow.description: Go to the consulate. Be prepared to answer questions about your study plans and intent to return.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

pre_visa_steps.title: Research & Shortlist
pre_visa_steps.description: Identify universities based on course, budget, and location.

pre_visa_steps.title: Take Standardized Tests
pre_visa_steps.description: Prepare for and take necessary exams (GRE, TOEFL, etc.) well in advance.

pre_visa_steps.title: Submit Applications
pre_visa_steps.description: Apply via Common App or university portals. Submit SOPs, LORs, and transcripts.

pre_visa_steps.title: Accept Offer & Pay Deposit
pre_visa_steps.description: Once admitted, accept the offer and pay the enrollment deposit to secure your seat.

pre_visa_steps.title: Request I-20
pre_visa_steps.description: Submit financial proof to the university to receive your Form I-20.
